        public boolean setIndicatorTarget(javafx.scene.image.ImageView targetIndicator,
                                  Object target)
        Set layout of a target indicator
        参数:
        targetIndicator - the image view of the target indicator
        target - the target indicated
        返回:
        if the indicator is needed to show
